shortDescription: Stack-based buffer overflow in Justsystem Ichitaro 9.x through 13.x, Ichitaro 2004, 2005, 2006, and Government 2006; Ichitaro for Linux; and FormLiner before 20060818 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via long Unicode strings in a crafted document, as being actively exploited by malware such as Trojan.Tarodrop.  NOTE: some details are obtained from third party information.
vulnerabilityName: justsystem formliner Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
